pageProduct.name: Wagner Evening Primrose Oil 1000 200 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

This formula;
Helps to maintain general health and wellbeing Is a good source of Omega-6 fatty acids
Contains Evening Primrose Oil, which is traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to help relieve dry, itchy skin

Features
Evening Primrose Oil is a good source of Linoleic acid (LA) and gamma-Linolenic acid (GLA) Omega-6 fatty acids, which both help to maintain good health. The oil has also been traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to relieve the symptoms of itching in dry skin conditions.
This formula provides 1000mg of Evening Primrose Oil in a convenient soft gel capsule.

Warnings

Always read the label; take only as directed, and if symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional.
Not recommended for use by pregnant and lactating women.

Formulated without:
Gluten, wheat, dairy products, egg, corn, artificial colours, artificial flavours or artificial sweeteners.

Ingredients

Each capsule provides
Evening Primrose Oil   1g (1000mg)
Equiv. Linoleic acid   700mg
Equiv. gamma-Linolenic acid  100mg

Directions

Take 2 capsules twice daily with food or as directed by your healthcare professional.
